content: परिणतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bending or stooping down, bowing. {@--2@} Ripeness, maturity, development; <ls>Mv. 2. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Change, transformation, transmutation. {@--4@} Fulfilment. {@--5@} Result, consequence, issue; परिणतिरवधार्या यत्नतः पंडितेन <ls>Bh. 2. 99</ls>; <ls n="Bh.">1. 20</ls>, <ls n="Bh.">3. 17</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6. 28</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4. 4.</ls> {@--6@} End, conelusion, close, termination; परिणतिरमणीयाः प्रीतयस्त्वद्विधानां <ls>Māl. 6. 7</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 6.">16</ls>; <ls>Śi. 11. 1.</ls> {@--7@} Close of life, old age; सेवाकारा परिणतिरभूत् <ls>V. 3. 1</ls>; अभवद्गतः परिणतिं शिथिलः परिमंदसूर्यनयनो दिवसः <ls>Śi. 9. 3</ls> (where प° means ‘end or conclusion’ also). {@--8@} Digestion (of food).
